description:
`bigip_ltm_pool_attachment` Manages nodes membership in pools

Resources should be named with their "full path". The full path is the combination of the partition + name of the resource. For example /Common/my-pool.

Note: node must be the full path to the node followed by the port. For example /Common/my-node:80

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Node.description: Node to add to the pool in /Partition/NodeName:Port format (e.g. /Common/Node01:80).

Pool.description: Name of the pool in /Partition/Name format.
